00044     inline G4double BDSEnergyCounterHit::GetEnergy()
00045     {return itsEnergy;}
00046 
00047   //    inline G4String GetName()
00048   //   {return itsName;}
00049 
00050     inline G4int BDSEnergyCounterHit::GetCopyNumber()
00051     {return itsCopyNumber;}
00052 
00053 
00054    inline void BDSEnergyCounterHit::SetEnergy(G4double Energy)
00055     {itsEnergy=Energy;}   
00056    inline void BDSEnergyCounterHit::AddEnergy(G4double Energy)
00057     {
00058 itsEnergy+=Energy;}   
00059 
00060     inline void BDSEnergyCounterHit::
00061        AddEnergyWeightedPosition(G4double EnergyWeightedPosition)
00062 {
00063  itsEnergyWeightedPosition += EnergyWeightedPosition;
00064 }
00065 
00066     inline G4double BDSEnergyCounterHit::
00067        GetEnergyWeightedPosition()
00068 {
00069 return itsEnergyWeightedPosition;
00070 }

00072 typedef G4THitsCollection<BDSEnergyCounterHit> BDSEnergyCounterHitsCollection;
00073 extern G4Allocator<BDSEnergyCounterHit> BDSEnergyCounterHitAllocator;
00074 
00075 inline void* BDSEnergyCounterHit::operator new(size_t)
00076 {
00077   void* aHit;
00078   aHit=(void*) BDSEnergyCounterHitAllocator.MallocSingle();
00079   return aHit;
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline void BDSEnergyCounterHit::operator delete(void *aHit)
00083 {
00084  BDSEnergyCounterHitAllocator.FreeSingle((BDSEnergyCounterHit*) aHit);
00085 }
